name: Chamomile
properties: Mild, floral aroma; known for calming effects.
usage_notes: Commonly used in bedtime teas to promote sleep and reduce anxiety.

name: Lavender
properties: Soothing fragrance; commonly used for relaxation and stress relief.
usage_notes: Often blended with chamomile to enhance relaxation effects.

name: Valerian Root
properties: Strong, earthy aroma; known for its sedative effects.
usage_notes: Effective in promoting deep sleep but may have a strong taste.

name: Ginseng
properties: Bitter and earthy; used for boosting energy and cognitive function.
usage_notes: Often found in morning teas and energy drinks.

name: Ginger
properties: Warm and spicy; aids digestion and reduces nausea.
usage_notes: Often combined with peppermint for digestive relief.
